lead_paragraph: KARETSKY--Alfred J. It all began at Stuyvesant High School. Over 60 years of friendship... an abiding deep affection... a lifetime of fun, with our families forever entwined. Steve and Merle Brenner Al and Joan Chasen Joe and Sue Levine Gilda Liebowtiz Arnie and Bobbie Salob 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KARETSKY, ALFRED J

snippet: KARETSKY--Alfred J. It all began at Stuyvesant High School. Over 60 years of friendship... an abiding deep affection... a lifetime of fun, with our families forever entwined. Steve and Merle Brenner Al and Joan Chasen Joe and Sue Levine Gilda Liebowtiz Arnie and Bobbie Salob 1/3
